location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省南京市
location.en: Nanjing, Jiangsu, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中央直管、教育部直属的中国研究型综合性大学，是双一流A类、985工程、211工程重点建设大学，前身为1952年院系调整时组建的南京工学院，源头可追溯至1902年的三江师范学堂。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in China directly administered by the Ministry of Education. It is a member of the Double First-Class University Plan (Class A), Project 985, and Project 211. Its predecessor was the Nanjing Institute of Technology, established during the 1952 national higher education restructuring, with roots tracing back to the Sanjiang Normal College in 1902.

description.zh-cn: 中国地质学家，中国工程院院士，现任东南大学校长。
description.en: Chinese geologist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, and the current President of Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任东南大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese political figure, current Communist Party Secretary of Southeast University.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，是主管教育事业和语言文字工作的政府机构。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work.

description.zh-cn: 由9所中国大陆理工特色的顶尖研究型大学组成的高校联盟。
description.en: An alliance of nine top research-oriented universities in mainland China with a focus on science and engineering.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于澳大利亚墨尔本的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university based in Melbourne, Australia.

nodes.id: 东南大学—蒙纳士大学苏州联合研究生院

zh-cn: 东南大学—蒙纳士大学苏州联合研究生院
en: Southeast University-Monash University Joint Graduate School (Suzhou)

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省苏州市
location.en: Suzhou, Jiangsu, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 由东南大学与蒙纳士大学合作创办的研究生院，是中国教育部批准设立的国内第一所中外合作研究生院。
description.en: A joint graduate school established by Southeast University and Monash University, the first of its kind approved by the Chinese Ministry of Education.

description.zh-cn: 中国电子学家，中国第一位电子学女博士，曾任东南大学校长、中华人民共和国教育部副部长。
description.en: Chinese electronics scientist, the first woman in China to receive a Ph.D. in electronics, former president of Southeast University and Vice Minister of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 东南大学的分子与生物电子学实验室，由韦钰创建。
description.en: The Molecular and Bio-electronics Laboratory at Southeast University, founded by Wei Yu.

en: State Administration for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defence

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部管理的国家局，负责组织管理国防科技工业。
description.en: A national bureau administered by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the organization and administration of the national defense science, technology, and industry.

en: 1952 readjustment of China's higher education system

description.zh-cn: 1952年中国政府对全国高等学校进行的院系调整，旨在模仿苏联模式，培养工业建设人才和师资，重组了大量综合性大学。
description.en: The 1952 nationwide restructuring of higher education institutions in China, aimed at emulating the Soviet model to train personnel for industrial construction and teaching, which involved the reorganization of many comprehensive universities.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期中国的国立大学。1949年后在中国大陆经院系调整拆分，其主要校舍及工学院成为南京工学院（今东南大学）的基础；1962年在台湾复校。
description.en: A national university in the Republic of China. After 1949, it was dismantled in mainland China during the higher education restructuring, with its main campus and engineering faculty forming the basis of Nanjing Institute of Technology (now Southeast University); it was re-established in Taiwan in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 1888年在南京成立的教会大学，1952年院系调整中解散，院系并入南京大学、南京工学院等校。
description.en: A private Christian university established in Nanjing in 1888. It was dissolved during the 1952 higher education restructuring, with its departments merged into Nanjing University, Nanjing Institute of Technology, and other institutions.

description.zh-cn: 1947年在无锡创办的私立大学，1952年院系调整中解散，部分院系并入南京工学院等校。
description.en: A private university founded in Wuxi in 1947. It was dissolved during the 1952 higher education restructuring, with some of its departments merged into Nanjing Institute of Technology and other institutions.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西西安的大学，其主体源于1952年院系调整时成立的华东航空学院。
description.en: A university located in Xi'an, Shaanxi, whose main body originated from the East China Aeronautical Institute established during the 1952 higher education restructuring.

description.zh-cn: 位于江苏南京的大学，前身为1952年院系调整时成立的华东水利学院。
description.en: A university in Nanjing, Jiangsu, formerly known as the East China Technical University of Water Resources, established during the 1952 higher education restructuring.

en: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China

description.zh-cn: 位于四川成都的大学，由交通大学、南京工学院、华南工学院的电讯工程有关专业合并创建而成。
description.en: A university located in Chengdu, Sichuan, established by merging the telecommunication engineering-related departments from Jiaotong University, Nanjing Institute of Technology, and South China Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, statesman, military leader, and diplomat, who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于江苏南京的大学，其主体源于1958年由南京工学院化工系整建制独立建校的南京化工学院。
description.en: A university in Nanjing, Jiangsu, whose main body originated from the Nanjing Institute of Chemical Technology, which was established in 1958 from the entire Chemical Engineering Department of the Nanjing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 位于江苏无锡的大学，其主体源于1958年由南京工学院食品工业系整建制东迁无锡成立的无锡轻工业学院。
description.en: A university in Wuxi, Jiangsu, whose main body originated from the Wuxi Institute of Light Industry, established in 1958 by relocating the entire Food Industry Department from the Nanjing Institute of Technology to Wuxi.

description.zh-cn: 位于江苏镇江的大学，其主体源于1960年由南京工学院农业机械系独立建制的南京农业机械学院。
description.en: A university in Zhenjiang, Jiangsu, whose main body originated from the Nanjing Institute of Agricultural Mechanization, which was independently established in 1960 from the Agricultural Machinery Department of the Nanjing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 原隶属于中华人民共和国铁道部的医学院校，2000年并入东南大学。
description.en: A medical college formerly affiliated with the Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China, which merged into Southeast University in 2000.

nodes.id: 南京交通高等专科学校

zh-cn: 南京交通高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 位于南京的交通类专科学校，2000年并入东南大学。
description.en: A vocational college for transport located in Nanjing, which merged into Southeast University in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 位于南京的地质类专科学校，2000年并入东南大学。
description.en: A geological vocational school located in Nanjing, which merged into Southeast University in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 中国结构工程师、桥梁工程专家，中国近代桥梁工程的奠基人之一。
description.en: Chinese structural engineer and expert in bridge engineering, considered one of the pioneers of modern bridge engineering in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国建筑学家，被誉为中国建筑史研究的开拓者之一。
description.en: Chinese architectural historian, regarded as a pioneer in the study of Chinese architectural history.

description.zh-cn: 东南大学下属学院，由建筑学家刘敦桢等人创建，是中国高等建筑学的摇篮之一。
description.en: A school within Southeast University, founded by architectural historian Liu Dunzhen and others. It is one of the cradles of higher architectural education in China.

description.zh-cn: 交通运输专家，获东南大学培养的中国第一位交通学科博士学位。
description.en: An expert in transportation, he was the first person in China to receive a Ph.D. in transportation, awarded by Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚企业家、金融家、慈善家，东南大学校友。
description.en: Indonesian entrepreneur, financier, and philanthropist; alumnus of Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 孙友宏担任东南大学校长。
description.en: Sun Youhong serves as the President of Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 邬小撑担任东南大学党委书记。
description.en: Wu Xiaocheng serves as the Communist Party Secretary of Southeast University.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 东南大学是中华人民共和国教育部直属高校。
description.en: Southeast University is a university directly administered by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 东南大学是卓越大学联盟的成员高校。
description.en: Southeast University is a member of the Excellence 9 alliance.

description.zh-cn: 为东南大学建校110周年题词“以科学名世，以人才报国”。
description.en: Inscribed 'Famed for science, serving the nation with talents' for the 110th anniversary of Southeast University.

relationships.target: 东南大学—蒙纳士大学苏州联合研究生院

description.zh-cn: 东南大学与蒙纳士大学合作创办了东南大学—蒙纳士大学苏州联合研究生院。
description.en: Southeast University co-founded the Southeast University-Monash University Joint Graduate School (Suzhou) with Monash University.

relationships.target: 东南大学—蒙纳士大学苏州联合研究生院

description.zh-cn: 蒙纳士大学与东南大学合作创办了东南大学—蒙纳士大学苏州联合研究生院。
description.en: Monash University co-founded the Southeast University-Monash University Joint Graduate School (Suzhou) with Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 韦钰曾任东南大学校长。
description.en: Wei Yu formerly served as the President of Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 韦钰在东南大学创建了中国第一个分子与生物电子学实验室，后命名为吴健雄实验室。
description.en: Wei Yu founded China's first molecular and bio-electronics laboratory at Southeast University, later named the Chien-Shiung Wu Laboratory.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄实验室是东南大学下属的科研机构。
description.en: The Chien-Shiung Wu Laboratory is a research institution under Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 国防科技工业局与教育部共建东南大学。
description.en: SASTIND and the Ministry of Education jointly support and develop Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 在1952年院系调整中，以原国立中央大学工学院为主体，并入金陵大学、私立江南大学等校部分院系，组建南京工学院（东南大学前身）。
description.en: During the 1952 higher education restructuring, the Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University) was established with the Faculty of Engineering of the former National Central University as its main body, incorporating departments from other institutions like the University of Nanking and Private Jiangnan University.

description.zh-cn: 1952年院系调整中，国立中央大学（时称南京大学）被拆分，其主体部分析出成立南京大学、南京工学院等院校。
description.en: During the 1952 higher education restructuring, National Central University (then known as Nanjing University) was dismantled, with its main components spun off to form Nanjing University, Nanjing Institute of Technology, and other institutions.

description.zh-cn: 原国立中央大学的工学院成为组建南京工学院（东南大学前身）的主体。
description.en: The Faculty of Engineering of the former National Central University became the main body for the establishment of the Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University).

description.zh-cn: 金陵大学的化学工程系和电机工程系并入组建南京工学院（东南大学前身）。
description.en: The Chemical Engineering and Electrical Engineering departments of the University of Nanking were merged into the Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University).

description.zh-cn: 私立江南大学的机械工程系、电机工程系和食品工业系并入组建南京工学院（东南大学前身）。
description.en: The Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Food Industry departments of Private Jiangnan University were merged into the Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University).

description.zh-cn: 南京工学院（东南大学前身）曾为华东航空学院（西北工业大学主体）提供办学场所、公共课教学和师资。
description.en: Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University) provided campus space, general education courses, and faculty for the East China Aeronautical Institute (the main body of Northwestern Polytechnical University).

description.zh-cn: 南京工学院（东南大学前身）曾为华东水利学院（河海大学前身）提供办学场所、公共课教学和师资。
description.en: Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University) provided campus space, general education courses, and faculty for the East China Technical University of Water Resources (predecessor of Hohai University).

description.zh-cn: 南京工学院（东南大学前身）无线电工程系部分骨干教师西迁成都，参与组建成都电讯工程学院（电子科技大学前身）。
description.en: Key faculty members from the Radio Engineering Department of Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University) relocated to Chengdu to help establish the Chengdu Institute of Radio Engineering (predecessor of UESTC).

description.zh-cn: 决定南京工学院（东南大学前身）无线电工程系主体停迁，得以保留在南京。
description.en: Decided that the main body of the Radio Engineering Department of Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University) should not be relocated, allowing it to remain in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 南京工学院（东南大学前身）化学工程系整建制划出，成立南京化工学院（南京工业大学主体）。
description.en: The entire Chemical Engineering Department of Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University) was spun off to establish the Nanjing Institute of Chemical Technology (the main body of Nanjing Tech University).

description.zh-cn: 南京工学院（东南大学前身）食品工业系整建制迁往无锡，成立无锡轻工学院（江南大学主体）。
description.en: The entire Food Industry Department of Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University) was relocated to Wuxi to establish the Wuxi Institute of Light Industry (the main body of Jiangnan University).

description.zh-cn: 以南京工学院（东南大学前身）机械二系为基础筹建南京农业机械学院（江苏大学主体前身）。
description.en: The Nanjing Institute of Agricultural Mechanization (predecessor of the main body of Jiangsu University) was established based on the Second Department of Mechanical Engineering of Nanjing Institute of Technology (predecessor of Southeast University).

description.zh-cn: 南京铁道医学院并入东南大学。
description.en: Nanjing Railway Medical College merged into Southeast University.

relationships.source: 南京交通高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 南京交通高等专科学校并入东南大学。
description.en: Nanjing College of Transport merged into Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 南京地质学校并入东南大学。
description.en: Nanjing Geological School merged into Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 出任国立东南大学（东南大学前身）首任工科主任，奠定了学校的工科学术传统，并创建了土木学科。
description.en: Served as the first head of the engineering department at National Southeast University (a predecessor of Southeast University), laying the foundation for the university's academic tradition in engineering and establishing the civil engineering discipline.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国建筑学的先驱，参与创建了东南大学建筑系。
description.en: As a pioneer of architecture in China, he participated in the founding of the Department of Architecture at Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 东南大学培养了中国第一位交通学科博士王炜。
description.en: Southeast University educated Wang Wei, who became the first person in China to receive a Ph.D. in transportation.

description.zh-cn: 向东南大学捐资，用于建设李文正楼和李文正图书馆。
description.en: Donated funds to Southeast University for the construction of the Li Wenzheng Building and the Mochtar Riady Library.
